price: Disse: "Se eu tivesse força contra vós, ou se me abrigasse a sólido esteio, aniquilar-vos-ia"
arabic: قَالَ لَوۡ أَنَّ لِي بِكُمۡ قُوَّةً أَوۡ ءَاوِيٓ إِلَىٰ رُكۡنٖ شَدِيدٖ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qāla law anna lī bikum quwwatan aw āwī ilā ruk'nin shadīdin
